DOC.brief_summary: Approximately 150 female volunteer wish become pregnant recruit via web recruitment around UK randomise 1:1 receive Clearblue Digital ovulation test ( active arm ) aid conception ( control arm ) 2 full menstrual cycle . All volunteer complete study questionnaire provide urine sample designate time point though menstrual cycle . A sub-arm study , apply protocol woman infertility treatment set ; Royal Hallamshire Hospital , Sheffield . Additional exclusion criterion apply cohort ; regular menstrual cycle 25 35 day , diagnosis bilateral unilateral tubal blockage , document anovulation severe male-factor infertility ( < 5 million motile sperm per ejaculate ) . For arm , protocol review Sheffield Research Ethics Committee 09/H1308/134 .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Stress Levels Consumers Using Ovulation Tests Order Conceive
DOC.criteria: Provide write informed consent participate study agree comply study procedure . Has menstrual bleeds . Seeking become pregnant . Living UK Used hormonal contraception within last 3 month . Currently undergoing fertility treatment investigation . Diagnosed infertile follow investigation . Drug alcohol dependency . history depression , anxiety panic attack
